item.description:
Dear Members,

If you've been aching for Laughing Matter, but up to now, your schedule has not been forgiving, you didn't know about us, or you'd been abducted by an alien, come out to this rehearsal! We'll get straight into it with blood-pumping warmups, mind-churning drills, and a smorgasbord of games. The venues need us and we need committed improvisers, so help make it happen Friday, 19 2010 7:00 pm at the Democracy Center.


See you then!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Open Rehearsal - Ensemble B Casting Call 2
